high_descs: walk ahead towards the left side of the computer desk
grab the powerbank out of the drawer of the desk
turn around and walk over to the right side of the desk
turn the light on the desk
anns.task_desc: turn the light on the desk on while holding a power bank

high_descs: Turn left, then turn right and go to the safe.
Pick up the safe from under the desk.
Turn around and go to the bed, then turn left.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: View a safe by lamp light.

high_descs: Head towards the top desk drawer to the right of the trash can
Remove the black drawer with the grey alarm clock
Move the drawer with the alarm clock to the table closest to the green plant
Turn on the lamp on top of the table to the left of the plant
anns.task_desc: Move a clock across the room, turn on lamp
